resources.string:
"user" says App isInstallable
 
	if App isGood.
 
 "user" says X can-say 0 App isGood
 
	if X isFriend.
 
 "user" says "alice" isFriend.
 
 "alice" says "com.rovio.angrybirds" isGood.
 "alice" says "bob" can-say 0 App isGood.
 "alice" says "bob" isFriend.
 
 "bob" says "com.facebook" isGood.
 
 "malory" says "com.flashlight" isGood.
